document_data.name: Arambarium
document_data.mainbody:
'''Arambarium''' was an extremely rare metal that resembled polished [[silver]]. It was tuned to [[primordial]] and [[elemental]] energy and could amplify [[magic]]al effects. It also had mundane uses such as in [[armor]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|495}}

The only known source of Arambarium around [[1479 DR]] was [[Ithimir Isle]] off the coast of [[Akanûl]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|503}} The Akanûlans mined the deposit and kept its location a closely guarded secret. In reality, the Arambarium mother lode was the preserved fist of the dead primordial [[Arambar]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|2880}}
